remarks: Remove from ~ rexcom4a dependency on ~ ax-ext and ~ ax-13 (and on ~ df-or , ~ df-sb , ~ df-clab , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-clel , ~ df-nfc , ~ df-v ).  This proof uses only ~ df-rex on top of first-order logic. (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-rexcom4a $p |- ( E. x E. y e. A ( ph /\ ps ) <-> E. y e. A ( ph /\ E. x ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
$d x y $.
